name: shipsheet
description: CLI for managing a local tasks.json ship sheet - exportable to Kanban or Google Sheets

scripts.release: pnpm build && changeset publish && git push --follow-tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --generate-notes -n "[Full Changelog](https://github.com/ahmadawais/shipsheet/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md)"

author: Ahmad Awais
